thread.title: Hilco Valuation Services Adds SVP of Business Development
thread.title_full: Hilco Valuation Services Adds SVP of Business Development

title: Hilco Valuation Services Adds SVP of Business Development
text:
Hilco Valuation Services Adds SVP of Business Development August 11, 2015, 07:57 AM Related: Hilco Valuation Services 
Thomas A. Greco, Chief Executive Officer, Hilco Valuation Services, LLC, today announced the appointment of Karin Gorynski as Senior Vice President, Business Development. Ms. Gorynski, who will be based in New York City, will focus on financial institutions, advisors, investors, and owners in the states of New York, New Jersey, Connecticut, Rhode Island, Maine, Vermont, New Hampshire, Pennsylvania, Maryland, and Washington, DC.Ms. Gorynski joins Hilco Global from GE Capital, where she has held various positions in financial services. After initially being recruited into and completing GE's signature Financial Management Program, Karin worked in Risk Management, Capital Markets, Asset Based Lending, and Equipment Finance. Most recently, Ms. Gorynski served as Senior Vice President of Equipment Sales, where she managed accounts across the NY metro market and focused on providing equipment loans and leases to middle market companies."We feel very fortunate to have someone of Karin's caliber join the Hilco team," said Tom Greco. "Her knowledge and experience of financial services, and particularly asset based lending, will be of great benefit to lenders, advisors, and private equity investors in helping move their transactions from qualification to closure."Ms. Gorynski graduated from Fairfield University with bachelor degrees in Accounting and Information Systems, and currently lives in Whitestone, NY, with her husband and son. She is active in Dress for Success and Bulldogs Care Organization. Today's Other News
